name: part_010
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: IRyS, Hakos Baelz, Nanashi Mumei, Ceres Fauna, and Ouro Kronii perform 'The Name of the Sin'.
scenes.song_name: Tsumi no Namae (The Name of the Sin)

scenes.description: MC section where IRyS thanks her group members and announces a new original song.

subtitles.original: 罪の名前
subtitles.english: The Name of the Sin

subtitles.original: ねずみはなんで嫌われるのでしょう
subtitles.english: Why are mice so hated?

subtitles.original: 彼らは笑って「汚いからだろう」
subtitles.english: They laugh and say, "Because they're dirty."

subtitles.original: それなら答えて
subtitles.english: If that's the case, then answer me

subtitles.original: 目のみえない僕のために
subtitles.english: for the sake of my blind eyes.

subtitles.original: 見て見ぬふりに理不尽な差別
subtitles.english: Turning a blind eye and unreasonable discrimination,

subtitles.original: それでねずみと何が違うの
subtitles.english: how is that any different from the mice?

subtitles.original: 嘲笑う彼らに続けて言うんだ
subtitles.english: Tell those who mock you...

subtitles.original: 「二度とするな」
subtitles.english: "Don't ever do that again."

subtitles.original: 嬉しいのになぜでしょうか
subtitles.english: I'm happy, so why is it?

subtitles.original: だって涙がほらやっぱり
subtitles.english: Because, you see, tears are...

subtitles.original: 溢れてくるのです
subtitles.english: ...still overflowing.

subtitles.original: もしかなりたいものになれるなら
subtitles.english: If I could become anything I wanted,

subtitles.original: あなたの前では普通の女の子に
subtitles.english: I'd want to be just an ordinary girl in front of you.

subtitles.original: 思えば思うほどに胸が苦しい
subtitles.english: The more I think about it, the more my heart aches.

subtitles.original: どうして私は私なのでしょうか
subtitles.english: Why must I be myself?

subtitles.original: 「君は優しい女の子なのに
subtitles.english: "Even though you're a kind girl,

subtitles.original: いつも自分を責める
subtitles.english: you're always blaming yourself.

subtitles.original: 慰めてあげたい君を
subtitles.english: I want to comfort you.

subtitles.original: そうだ、ここに咲いた花を君に捧げよう
subtitles.english: I know, I'll give you this flower that bloomed here.

subtitles.original: それは見事な白いユリの花」
subtitles.english: It's a magnificent white lily."

subtitles.original: さあ、と君の近くに寄っていくよ
subtitles.english: He says, and draws closer to you.

subtitles.original: 運命の女神様は意地悪だ
subtitles.english: The Goddess of Fate is cruel.

subtitles.original: 醜いあの子を見たらどんな顔
subtitles.english: What kind of face would she make

subtitles.original: するんでしょう
subtitles.english: if she saw that ugly child?

subtitles.original: 見物ね
subtitles.english: It'll be quite a sight.

subtitles.original: 迷子、迷子な俺と魔法をかける
subtitles.english: I, a lost soul, shall cast a spell.

subtitles.original: 花は黒く淀んだ色に染まる
subtitles.english: The flower is dyed in a murky black color.

subtitles.original: それは不吉な黒いユリの花
subtitles.english: It's an ominous black lily.

subtitles.original: 「お前へこれから贈り物だ
subtitles.english: "Here's a gift for you.

subtitles.original: そら、血の匂いさ」
subtitles.english: Look, it's the scent of blood."

subtitles.original: ああ、これはきっと罰です
subtitles.english: Ah, this must be my punishment.

subtitles.original: だって私が身の程知らずに
subtitles.english: Because I unknowingly...

subtitles.original: 恋をしたから
subtitles.english: ...fell in love.

subtitles.original: いっそ、死んでしまえばいいのでしょう
subtitles.english: I should probably just die.

subtitles.original: あなたは叫ぶ「泣かないで、僕がずっと」
subtitles.english: You shout, "Don't cry, I'll always..."

subtitles.original: 「死ぬまでそばにいるからさ」
subtitles.english: "...be by your side until I die."

subtitles.original: 「今日から君は普通の女の子さ」
subtitles.english: "From today on, you're just an ordinary girl."

subtitles.original: 「それに見えるよ」
subtitles.english: "That's how you look to me."

subtitles.original: 悪夢のような魔法はほら
subtitles.english: Look, the nightmare-like spell...

subtitles.original: 解けたみたい
subtitles.english: ...seems to have been broken.

subtitles.original: And that was "Tsumi no Namae" with my Promise ladies!
subtitles.english: And that was "Tsumi no Namae" with my Promise ladies!

subtitles.original: Did you guys like it?
subtitles.english: Did you guys like it?

subtitles.original: Let's just say that that was the last song—or I said that that was the last song, even though I did not say that a few minutes ago.
subtitles.english: Let's just say that that was the last song—or I said that that was the last song, even though I did not say that a few minutes ago.

subtitles.original: Ah, I think this live is over already! What should I do?
subtitles.english: Ah, I think this live is over already! What should I do?

subtitles.original: どうしようかな...
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: えーっ？
subtitles.english: Ehh?

subtitles.original: You guys want more?
subtitles.english: You guys want more?

subtitles.original: しょうがないなあ！
subtitles.english: Oh, fine then!

subtitles.original: Or more like, I still have this exciting announcement to make!
subtitles.english: Or more like, I still have this exciting announcement to make!

subtitles.original: Can you guys guess what it is?
subtitles.english: Can you guys guess what it is?

subtitles.original: Yeah! It is a new original song!
subtitles.english: Yeah! It is a new original song!

subtitles.original: Yeah, it is a new song called "Twilight," written by Yunosuke-san,
subtitles.english: Yeah, it is a new song called "Twilight," written by Yunosuke-san,

subtitles.original: with lyrics written by Gyuniku-san.
subtitles.english: with lyrics written by Gyuniku-san.

subtitles.original: It is a really, really, really cool song, and...
subtitles.english: It is a really, really, really cool song, and...
